reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, with one noting it doesn't look like a swimsuit cover-up, and appreciate its comfortable fit that's right above the knee. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, soft material, and practical features like pockets and its suitability as a beach cover-up. While some customers find it true to size, others mention it runs a little large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little dress, fits in suitcase nicely.
items.body: Bought this last minute for a cruise with a white night celebration. It is comfortable, cute and travels well. Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and comfortable! Easy care, neat appearance.
items.body: Lovely, lightweight and extremely comfortable! I’m amazed how pretty this dress is, on me. I’m shorter than their model so it hits me just above the knee! Looks fresh and neat after washing . Read more
items.author: Sadie's Mom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit is OK, pattern is true to picture.
items.body: It's a nice, lightweight, dress. Color seems true to picture shown. I did get a XL because it was mentioned that it doesn't have much elasticity and was tight on the bust for some. And overall - this decision works. The only downside is that the arm hole's themselves are a little overly large because my bust doesn't fill it out as much as the sizing demands. It's not a big deal and it's not extremely noticeable - but something to mention. The pockets are a decent size (something I'd consider par-for-the-course when it comes to women's pocket size), but the only 'downside' being that they're attached to the outside of the dress, not inline. Which on a dress I always feel is a little clunkier. Read more
items.author: fenumeorme

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great swimsuit coverup
items.body: Big fan of this. Was thick enough to provide coverage while being thin enough to be comfortable on the beach. Good length for a cover-up or a summer dress. I'm an XL and it was flattering- just flowy enough. The green pattern is super cute. Read more
items.author: Lace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super quality- super comfy -super price
items.body: Absolutely LOVE this dress! I bought several now. Fits great, launders well and you can’t beat the price. Even if you just wanted it for a nightgown it would be great. The fabric is a good weight and is made very well. The price fluctuates but I purchased it for under ten dollars. Even sent one as a gift I like it so much. Read more
items.author: texellence

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but flimsy
items.body: Super cute, fit well but super flimsy. If u put phone in pocket it pulls the dress down. Read more
items.author: Maddie_sun

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft material and very comfy
items.body: Very cute and soft material. It just comes much larger than I expected. I still kept it, but I would suggest ordering one size down. Read more
items.author: Erin G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and comfortable
items.body: Love the pockets! These dresses are light and comfortable, perfect for the summer. Since they're almost entirely polyester, they're great for travel because they don't wrinkle much. Be aware that some of the colors have fabric with holes, so I wouldn't recommend wearing those with bright underwear. I ordered the black and what they call bright green (not bright, but true to the picture). I ordered the same size (L) for both, but there is some discrepancy, because the black one fits me perfectly while the green one is a bit tight. Fortunately the fabric is stretchy so it's not a big deal. Read more
items.author: Alex

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Boho, Black, Flora White Green White, Floral Tie Dye, Plain Hot Pink, Plain Light Green, Plain Green, Bright Green, Floral Leaf, Plain Apricot, Eyelet Navyblue, Flora Blue Leaf, Eyelet Lightblue, Plain Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
